maqras.text: When the sky splits apart
And heeds its Lord´s command, as it truly must
When the earth distends
Casts off its contents, and becomes bare and blank
It will heed its Lord´s command, as it truly must
Oh man! Indeed, you are steadily advancing towards your Lord. You shall meet Him
Then, the one who is given his record (of deeds) in his right (hand)
Will truly face a light (and lenient) reckoning
And will happily return to his folks
But the one who is given his record of deed behind his back
Will call for (his own) death
But will roast in the fiery blaze
(In his life), he had been happy (and contented) among his kin
And (spuriously) assumed that he would never have to come back (to his Lord)
Why not? His Lord was (always) watching all his deeds
No! Really, I swear by the sunset glow
And the night, and everything it enshrouds
And the moon when it is full
You would definitely move along, from one stage to another
What is with them? Why don´t they believe
When the Qur´an is recited before them, why do they not fall prostrate
Instead, the unbelievers refuse to accept
Indeed, Allah (alone) knows what (kind of) deeds they collect
So give them the news of a painful punishment
(Which will strike all), except those who believe and perform righteous deeds. For them, there exists an unrestricted, ever-lasting reward
(I swear) by the sky, with (all) its constellations
(And by) the promised day (of Judgment)
And (by) the witness (bearing the evidence), as well as the evidence (itself)
Doomed are the people of the ditch
(The ditch) full of fire and abundant fuel
Remember, when the unbelievers sat by the fire
And were themselves witness to what they did to the believers
They were hostile (and rancorous), just because the believers believed in Allah, the most Powerful and the most Praiseworthy
To Whom belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. Allah is the Witness to every single thing
Indeed, those who persecuted the believing men and women and then failed to repent, would (certainly) face the torture of hell. For them, is the punishment of the blazing fire
While the (blissful) paradise _ rivers run right through it _ is for those who believe and do righteous deeds. That is the greatest triumph
Your Lord´s punishment is very severe, indeed
It is He Who created; and He it is, Who will recreate
He is the most Forgiving and the most Loving
Owner of the majestic throne
(The Efficient Achiever)! He does what He pleases
Has the story of the armies reached you
(Armies of) the pharaoh and the (people of) ´Samood´
The unbelievers, in fact (were and) are (persistent) in their denial
Allah has surrounded them all around
This (narrative) is certainly the majestic Qur´an
Safely preserved on (the sacred) slates
(I swear) by the sky, and the night star
And how would you know what the night star is
(It is) a bright star
There is no soul without a guardian over it
Let man look at (and bear in mind) the substance he is created from
(He is) created from the surging fluid
Which springs from between the spine and the ribs
Indeed, He is (certainly) capable of bringing man back to life
That day, (all) secrets would be laid bare
(That day), man shall not have any strength, nor any helpers
(I swear) by the sky that repeatedly sends rain down
And by the earth that splits (and lets plants emerge)
Indeed, this Qur´an is the statement that sifts (right from wrong)
It is not an idle tale
They are hatching a nefarious plot
But I, too, shall devise a scheme
So give the unbelievers a little respite. Deal with them gently for a while
